screens

Class ChatManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • screens.ChatManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The chat manager is the interface between the screen, and the chat's client and the chat's server.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
